title: Inspired by unrest, Karl Perry works to redefine city school climate
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: Breaking - Today 
Karl Perry watched the violent exchange between teens and police officers in the streets surrounding Mondawmin Mall on April 27 with dismay ...
